text: British Vogue is a British fashion magazine published based in London since autumn 1916. It is the British version of the American magazine Vogue. The magazine is considered to be one that connects fashion to high society and class.König A. (2006). Glossy Words: An Analysis of Fashion Writing in British Vogue. Fashion Theory: The Journal of Dress, Body & Culture, 10(1/2), 205–224. ==References== Category:1910s establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1916 establishments in Europe Category:Magazines of the United Kingdom Category:Fashion magazines
title: British Vogue
